title: Did Cray's twins use an elephant to steal the London tram?
subtitle: A picture of Phil standing near Tram in London is often shared with a fairy tale of English twins Ronnie and Reggie Cray.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The image of the twins (Cray) shows the beginning of organized crime "the rule of terror" in London by stealing the tram with the help of Phil.
